title: The Herd-HOUR-1-Kawhi Leonard, Leonard Fournette
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-1-Kawhi Leonard, Leonard Fournette
description:
Doug Gottlieb in for Colin


Kawhi Leonard is the best & the future of the NBA 

Leonard Fournette was a bad teammate

The NBA is beginning to no longer be fun


Guest: John Hollinger
